column1: # WendyOS devices-wendyos.csv - Additional device/sysfs mappings for containers
# These supplement the base devices.csv from meta-tegra
# Tegra platform information (required for GPU driver initialization)
# CPU information (for cpuinfo library - fixes PyTorch initialization)
# GPU monitoring files (explicit files for principle of least privilege)
# Using gpu.0 symlink for portability across Orin Nano/AGX devices
# so we must mount both for the symlinks to work in containers
# Audio stack - Complete audio/Bluetooth support for containers
# Containers need both low-level (ALSA) and high-level (PipeWire/Pulse) access
# ALSA device nodes (direct hardware access - needed for some apps)
# PipeWire runtime sockets (preferred - modern audio routing)
# D-Bus session bus (required for Bluetooth device control)
# PipeWire libraries and plugins (needed for containers to load PipeWire modules)
